remarks: Any preimage of a singleton by a simple function is measurable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sitgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.

sibfmbl.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) $.
